QueryResult.text: SELECT OS.PRINCIPAL_ID USER_ID, RI.OBJECT_ID, OA.RECORD_ID OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID, PE.PERMISSION_CODE, PE.PERMISSION_VALUE, OA.ID, OS.ID OS_ID, PE.ID PE_ID FROM CMN_SEC_ASSGND_RIGHT OS, CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS PE, CMN_SEC_RIGHT RI, PRJ_OBS_ASSOCIATIONS OA, OBS_UNITS_FLAT_BY_MODE OU WHERE OS.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'USER' AND OS.INSTANCE_TYPE = OU.UNIT_MODE AND OS.INSTANCE_ID = OU.UNIT_ID AND OU.LINKED_UNIT_ID = OA.UNIT_ID AND RI.RIGHT_ID = OS.RIGHT_ID AND UPPER(OA.TABLE_NAME) = UPPER(RI.RIGHT_OBS_TYPE) AND OS.RIGHT_ID = RI.RIGHT_ID AND RI.PERMISSION_ID = PE.PERMISSION_ID
